title: Bomber Girl
description:
The world’s sexiest bounty huntress prepares to take on terrorists looking to take over the world!

Who says crime doesn’t pay? Certainly not Rashomon Emi, a 19-year-old, fun loving, materialistic bounty huntress who operates in 21st century Tokyo, the newest murder capital of the world. Emi’s pet target is Megalith, a terrorist organization with a world dominating agenda and a squadron of mutated minions. But will Bomber Girl get to collect her just rewards wen the group puts a bounty on her head!?
